title: Beef Stroganoff
ingredients: 1 lb beef sirloin, sliced into thin strips
instructions: In a large skillet over medium-high heat, brown beef, onion, garlic, and mushrooms in butter.
Stir in flour until well combined.
Gradually stir in beef broth, and bring to a simmer.
Reduce heat to low, and stir in sour cream, mustard, salt, and pepper.
